parameters.query: =SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE chat_id = '{{ $json.chatId }}' AND appointment_date_iso >= NOW() ORDER BY appointment_date_iso ASC LIMIT 1

=SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE 
  (reminder_30min_sent = false AND reminder_30min <= NOW()) OR
  (reminder_20min_sent = false AND reminder_20min <= NOW()) OR
  (reminder_10min_sent = false AND reminder_10min <= NOW())

const bookingData = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: bookingData }];

const bookingData = $input.first().json.bookingData;
return [{ json: bookingData }];

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO appointments (
  chat_id, 
  user_name, 
  appointment_date, 
  appointment_date_iso, 
  appointment_date_formatted, 
  reminder_30min, 
  reminder_20min, 
  reminder_10min, 
  event_summary, 
  event_description, 
  reminder_30min_sent, 
  reminder_20min_sent, 
  reminder_10min_sent, 
  meet_link, 
  calendar_event_id
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.chatId }}', 
  '{{ $json.userName }}', 
  '{{ $json.appointmentDate }}', 
  '{{ $json.appointmentDateISO }}', 
  '{{ $json.appointmentDateFormatted }}', 
  '{{ $json.reminder30min }}', 
  '{{ $json.reminder20min }}', 
  '{{ $json.reminder10min }}', 
  '{{ $json.eventSummary }}', 
  '{{ $json.eventDescription }}', 
  {{ $json.reminder30minSent }}, 
  {{ $json.reminder20minSent }}, 
  {{ $json.reminder10minSent }}, 
  '{{ $json.meetLink }}', 
  '{{ $json.calendarEventId }}'
)
RETURNING *

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS appointments (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  chat_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  user_name VARCHAR(255),
  appointment_date TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
  appointment_date_iso TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
  appointment_date_formatted VARCHAR(255),
  reminder_30min TIMESTAMPTZ,
  reminder_20min TIMESTAMPTZ,
  reminder_10min TIMESTAMPTZ,
  event_summary TEXT,
  event_description TEXT,
  reminder_30min_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  reminder_20min_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  reminder_10min_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  meet_link TEXT,
  calendar_event_id VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_chat_id ON appointments(chat_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_date ON appointments(appointment_date_iso);
